alert.note: Alert for Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 16 at 8:52AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring along US-89 near Thistle Creek between Birdseye and Thistle Junction. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following county, Utah. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding will continue during peak flows in the evening and overnight hours along US-89 between Birdseye and Thistle Junction. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 850 AM MDT, local law enforcement reported Thistle Creek is flowing across US-89 between Birdseye and Thistle Junction. US-89 is currently closed in this area and additional closures are possible through the next several days. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... US-89 corridor near Thistle Creek from Thistle Junction south of north of Birdseye.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
